text: The Last Metro () is a 1980 French romance movie directed by François Truffaut. It stars Gérard Depardieu, Catherine Deneuve, Jean Poiret, Jean- Louis Richard, Heinz Bennent, and Richard Bohringer. It was distributed by Gaumount and was nominated for Academy Award in 1981. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 romance movies Category:1980 war movies Category:1980s historical movies Category:French romance movies Category:Movies directed by François Truffaut Category:Movies set in a movie theatre
title: The Last Metro
